description:
I`m a NEET again! I guess I`ll go to the employment office... Nah, I`ll do it tomorrow.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Danna wa Tama ni Keibishoku ni Nenjuumukyuu de Tsuite Orimasu
My Husband Primarily Works in the Year-Round Home Surveillance Business
Parfois mon mari travaille comme gardien sans prendre de vacances
旦那はたまに警備職に年中無休で就いております
